adHeader: A quick auto body, repair and glass
adDetails: We do all kind of mechanical repair service, mobile glass service, glass, paint, oil change, damages, small dents. All insurance work or damage repairs are accepted by us. We repair any car no matter how much the damage is. We serve the whole bay area. We have 35 years of experience in this field. customer satisfaction is our priority. If you have any questions, please contact me at show contact info. Thank you! To have any service done, here is the location address: 16410 East 14th street San Leandro California, 94578
